title: SCA Foundations of Coffee
description: Learn the fundamentals of coffee through the Specialty Coffee Association's comprehensive curriculum. Perfect for beginners and coffee enthusiasts.

title: SCA Brewing Professional
description: Master the art and science of coffee brewing. Learn various brewing methods, water chemistry, and extraction principles.

title: SCA Barista Skills
description: Develop professional barista skills including espresso preparation, milk steaming, and customer service excellence.

title: CQI Q Grader Certification
description: Become a certified Q Grader through the Coffee Quality Institute. The most prestigious coffee cupping certification in the industry.

title: Home Brewing Workshop
description: Hands-on workshop for home coffee enthusiasts. Learn to brew better coffee at home using various methods.
